task_1.description: Place the red plastic cup next to the blue paper cup
task_1.required_objects: red plastic cup, blue paper cup
task_1.initial_setup: The red plastic cup is upright on the left side of the table, 20 cm from the edge. The blue paper cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A white tissue is folded and lying flat on the center of the table, 10 cm from the red cup.
task_1.final_state: The red plastic cup is upright and placed directly adjacent to the blue paper cup, with the tissue moved to the far right corner of the table.

task_2.description: Move the green tissue to the left of the yellow paper cup
task_2.initial_setup: The green tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the left side of the table, 15 cm from the edge. The yellow paper cup is upright on the right side, 15 cm from the edge. A red plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center of the table.
task_2.final_state: The green tissue is flat and positioned 10 cm to the left of the yellow paper cup. The red cup is upright and placed on the far left corner of the table.

task_3.description: Stack the blue plastic cup on top of the green tissue
task_3.initial_setup: The blue plastic cup is upright on the left side of the table, 25 cm from the edge. The green tissue is folded and lying flat on the center of the table, 10 cm from the red plastic cup. A yellow paper cup is upright on the right side, 25 cm from the edge.
task_3.final_state: The blue plastic cup is upright and placed directly on top of the green tissue, which is now flat and centered on the table. The yellow cup remains untouched.

task_4.description: Avoid the red tissue while placing the blue cup next to the green cup
task_4.required_objects: red tissue, blue plastic cup, green paper cup
task_4.initial_setup: The red tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the center of the table. The blue plastic cup is upright on the left side, 20 cm from the edge. The green paper cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A yellow tissue is folded and placed near the red tissue.
task_4.final_state: The blue cup is placed 10 cm to the left of the green cup. The red tissue remains untouched, and the yellow tissue is moved to the far right corner.

task_5.description: Use the permanent marker to label the blue cup with a red dot
task_5.initial_setup: The blue plastic cup is upright on the center of the table. The permanent marker is lying upright on the far left corner, 30 cm from the edge. A red tissue is folded and placed near the cup.
task_5.final_state: The blue cup has a single red dot drawn on its side using the permanent marker. The marker is placed back on the far left corner.

task_6.description: Place the green tissue under the blue paper cup
task_6.initial_setup: The green tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the left side of the table. The blue paper cup is upright on the right side, 25 cm from the edge. A red plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center.
task_6.final_state: The green tissue is flat and positioned directly under the blue cup, which is now tilted slightly to accommodate it. The red cup is upright on the far left corner.

task_7.description: Move the yellow paper cup to the center of the table, avoiding the red tissue
task_7.initial_setup: The yellow paper cup is upright on the far right corner, 25 cm from the edge. The red tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the center of the table. A blue plastic cup is upright on the left side, 20 cm from the edge.
task_7.final_state: The yellow cup is placed directly on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. The red tissue is moved to the far left corner.

task_8.description: Sort the cups by color: red on the left, blue on the right
task_8.required_objects: red plastic cup, blue plastic cup
task_8.initial_setup: The red plastic cup is upright on the center of the table. The blue plastic cup is upright on the far right corner, 25 cm from the edge. A green tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the left side.
task_8.final_state: The red cup is placed on the far left corner, and the blue cup is moved to the far right corner. The green tissue is moved to the center of the table.
